page.title: 12 A TYPICAL HOUSE,COLLIER ROW
page.content: "My house is an end of terrace,it is made of brick,with pebble dash over it.It has a tiled roof,we have an extension which blends in with the house.We have very old windows and one is falling out." "We have a big driveway but no garage.We have a very nice garden.We use electricity and have gas central heating and a small porch." "We have six rooms-three bedrooms,a bathroom and lounge and a kitchen.The biggest room is the lounge and the smallest is the bathroom.We have some patio doors which join the extension to the lounge. We have a very big loft."
